class.name: CheckBox
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: Simple div based toggle button / checkBox button

constructor.param: style data to pass to the object

class.property: Is the check box checked or not.

event.name: onClick
event.description: Fires when the button is clicked

event.name: onChange
event.description: Fires when the checked state of the button changes

event.name: onMouseOver
event.description: fires when the mouse is over the button

event.name: onMouseOut
event.description: fires when the mouse leaves the button

method.name: setEnabled
method.description: Enables or disables the CheckBox button

method.name: setChecked
method.description: Checks or unchecks the CheckBox button
